blocks.title: Block title
paragraphs: The program, which is traditionally called «Hello, world!», Is very simple. It outputs the phrase «Hello, world!», Or some other similar phrase, somewhere using some language.

JavaScript is a language in which programs can be run in different environments. In our case, we are talking about browsers and the Node.js server platform. If you have not written a single line of JS code so far and you are reading this text in a browser, on desktop, it means you're literally seconds away from your first JavaScript program.

There are other ways to run JS code in the browser. For example, if we talk about the usual use of JavaScript programs, they are loaded into the browser to provide web pages. Typically, the code is formatted as separate .js files that include to web pages, but code can also be included directly in the page code. All this is done using the <script> tag. When the browser detects such code, it executes it. For details about the script tag, see w3school.com. In particular , consider an example that demonstrates working with a web page using JavaScript, given on this resource.This example can be run using this resource (look for the Try it Yourself button), but we will do it a little differently. Namely, we will create in some text editor (for example - in VS Code or in Notepad++) a new file, which we will call hello.html, and add the following code to it:

articles.title: How to Code in TypeScript
articles.subtitle: Learn the basics of TypeScript coding

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: TypeScript is a statically typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
It is designed for large-scale applications and provides optional type annotations and other features to help developers catch errors early.

articles.title: Breaking News: New COVID Variant Found
articles.subtitle: Experts warn of potential dangers and urge caution

blocks.title: Summary
paragraphs: Scientists have identified a new variant of the COVID virus.
The variant, known as B.1.1.529, has been detected in several countries and has a large number of mutations.
Experts are concerned that the new variant could be more transmissible and potentially more resistant to vaccines.

blocks.title: Mutations in the new COVID variant

articles.title: The Future of AI: Opportunities and Challenges
articles.subtitle: An in-depth look at the potential of artificial intelligence

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly changing the way we live and work.
With advances in machine learning and natural language processing, AI is becoming more intelligent and more human-like.
In this article, we'll explore the opportunities and challenges of AI and what the future holds.

blocks.title: The Future of AI
paragraphs: AI has the potential to revolutionize many industries, from healthcare to finance to transportation.
However, there are also concerns about job displacement and ethical issues surrounding AI.
As AI becomes more advanced, it will be important for society to carefully consider the risks and benefits.

articles.title: 10 Tips for Productive Remote Work
articles.subtitle: Maximize your productivity while working from home

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: With more and more people working remotely, it's important to stay productive and focused.
In this article, we'll share 10 tips for productive remote work.

blocks.title: Tip #1: Establish a routine
paragraphs: Set regular working hours and stick to them.
Create a routine that works for you and helps you stay focused.

articles.title: The Benefits of Meditation: How it Can Improve Your Life
articles.subtitle: Discover the power of meditation and learn how to incorporate it into your daily routine.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Meditation has been shown to have a variety of benefits, from reducing stress and anxiety to improving focus and concentration.
In this article, we'll explore some of the ways in which meditation can improve your life, and provide some tips on how to get started with a meditation practice.

blocks.title: The Science of Meditation
paragraphs: Meditation has been the subject of numerous scientific studies, which have found that it can have a positive impact on a wide range of mental and physical health outcomes.
For example, studies have found that meditation can reduce symptoms of depression and anxiety, lower blood pressure, and improve immune function.

articles.title: 10 Tips for Better Time Management
articles.subtitle: Learn how to make the most of your time with these practical tips and strategies.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Time management is a critical skill that can help you be more productive and achieve your goals.
In this article, we'll share 10 practical tips and strategies for better time management, so you can make the most of your time and get more done.

blocks.title: Tip #1: Prioritize Your Tasks
paragraphs: One of the keys to effective time management is prioritization. Start each day by making a list of the tasks you need to accomplish, and then prioritize them based on their importance and urgency.
Focus on the most important tasks first, and work your way down the list.

blocks.title: A to-do list with tasks prioritized by importance and urgency

articles.title: The Benefits of Running: Why You Should Lace Up Your Sneakers
articles.subtitle: Discover the physical and mental benefits of running and how to get started.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Running is a popular form of exercise that offers a wide range of benefits, from improving cardiovascular health to reducing stress and anxiety.
In this article, we'll explore some of the ways in which running can improve your life, and provide some tips on how to get started with a running routine.

blocks.title: The Physical Benefits of Running
paragraphs: Running is an excellent way to improve your cardiovascular health, build strength and endurance, and maintain a healthy weight.
It can also reduce your risk of chronic diseases such as heart disease, stroke, and diabetes.

articles.title: The Mental Benefits of Yoga for Athletes
articles.subtitle: Learn how practicing yoga can improve your mental game on and off the field.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Yoga is a popular practice that offers a wide range of mental and physical benefits, including improved flexibility, strength, and balance.
In this article, we'll focus on the mental benefits of yoga for athletes, including how it can help you stay focused, calm, and resilient on and off the field.

blocks.title: Reducing Stress and Anxiety
paragraphs: Yoga can help reduce stress and anxiety by promoting relaxation and mindfulness.
Athletes who practice yoga may be better equipped to manage the stress of competition and training, and may experience improved mental clarity and focus.

blocks.title: An athlete practicing a yoga pose

articles.title: The Evolution of Football: How the Game Has Changed Over the Years
articles.subtitle: From leather balls to instant replays, football has come a long way since its early days.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Football is one of the most popular sports in the world, with millions of fans tuning in to watch games every week.
But the game has changed a lot over the years, from the early days of leather balls and no helmets to the high-tech stadiums and instant replays of today.

blocks.title: The Early Days of Football
paragraphs: Football dates back to ancient times, with versions of the game played by the Greeks, Romans, and Chinese.
But it wasn't until the 19th century that the modern game began to take shape, with the establishment of rules and the use of a round ball.

articles.title: The Importance of Nutrition for Football Players
articles.subtitle: Learn how proper nutrition can help football players perform at their best.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Football is a physically demanding sport that requires strength, speed, and endurance.
Proper nutrition is essential for football players to perform at their best and stay healthy throughout the season.

blocks.title: Fueling the Body for Performance
paragraphs: Football players need to eat a balanced diet that includes plenty of protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats.
They also need to stay hydrated and fuel their bodies with nutritious snacks before and after games and practices.

blocks.title: A plate of nutritious food for football players

articles.title: FC Barcelona: A History of Success
articles.subtitle: From Johan Cruyff to Lionel Messi, Barcelona has a rich history of talented players and championship victories.

blocks.title: Introduction
paragraphs: FC Barcelona, also known as Barça, is one of the most successful football clubs in history.
With a long list of talented players and numerous championship victories, Barcelona has become a legendary team in the world of football.

blocks.title: A Legacy of Greatness
paragraphs: Barcelona has a rich history of talented players, from Johan Cruyff and Diego Maradona to Lionel Messi and Neymar.
The team has won numerous championships, including 26 La Liga titles, 31 Copa del Rey titles, and 5 UEFA Champions League titles.
Barcelona has also produced some of the greatest managers in football history, including Pep Guardiola and Johan Cruyff.

blocks.title: The Camp Nou Stadium in Barcelona
The Future of Barcelona
paragraphs: Barcelona has faced some challenges in recent years, including financial struggles and the departure of some key players.
But the team remains committed to its legacy of greatness and has a talented roster of players and coaches who are working hard to bring more championships to the club.
With the support of its loyal fans and a strong commitment to excellence, FC Barcelona will continue to be a dominant force in the world of football for years to come.
